achievements: Emmy Award winner for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Drama Series for her role as Carrie Mathison in Homeland
Golden Globe Award winner for Best Actress – Television Series Drama for her role as Carrie Mathison in Homeland
Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Drama Series for her portrayal of Queen Elizabeth II in The Crown
Golden Globe Award for Best Actress – Television Series Drama for her role as Queen Elizabeth II in The Crown
Her novel The Emperor's Children was a finalist for the Pulitzer Prize
Her experimental pop music has garnered critical acclaim
